title: Web Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Metaverse-Based Pre-Service Teacher Training Program: Virtual Reality in Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain science curriculum lesson design and operational procedures in a metaverse environment with over 80% accuracy
Learners directly design and execute science experiment simulation lessons using virtual reality tools at least three times
Learners derive at least three improvement plans for metaverse-based lessons through peer assessment and self-reflection
Learners apply and execute at least four learner interaction management strategies in digital platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
